relics.name: Ascenders Badge
relics.description: Remove Ascender's Bane in your deck.
relics.flavorText: The changes of the spire won't stop you from climbing higher.

relics.name: Badge Of Simplicity
relics.description: The first time you play "Strike" or "Defend" each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: There's nothing on it. Simple.

relics.name: Berserker Badge
relics.description: If last room was Combat , gain 2 Strength in this combat.
relics.flavorText: Awarded to warriors who are not afraid of pain and go forward bravely.

relics.name: Big Sale
relics.description: Potions in shop cost 1 Gold . (Doesn't affect extra potions when you have Courier)
relics.flavorText: There are few people who'd like to buy potions , are there?

relics.name: Blast Shield
relics.description: Whenever you lose ALL Block because of enemy's attack, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Once it's broken , it will release huge energy.

relics.name: Blood Bag
relics.description: If you lose at least 20 HP in a combat, immediately gain 20 Temporary HP this combat.
relics.flavorText: Use this when bleeding is excessive.

relics.name: Death Reaper
relics.description: You deals 120% attack damage to enemies whose HP is below 50% .
relics.flavorText: You wouldn't like to meet its owner.

relics.name: Dust Of Life
relics.description: Whenever you play a Uncommon or Rare Colorless card , exhaust it and heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: After this magical plant turns into dust, a new seedling will grow out of it.

relics.name: Energy Saver
relics.description: Gain [E] after you play a X-cost card.
relics.flavorText: Don't waste your energy!

relics.name: Gold Magnet
relics.description: Regular combats have a 25% chance to drop a relic.
relics.flavorText: Treasures are buried everywhere!

relics.name: Holographic Shield
relics.description: At the start of each turn , gain Block equal to 1 + the number of turns.
relics.flavorText: Can this shield really block damage?

relics.name: Icosahedron Dice
relics.description: After 20 turns (accumulative between combats) , gain a random Rare Relic after that combat and lose effect.
relics.flavorText: V-E+F=2

relics.name: Milk
relics.description: When you use a potion in combat , gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity .
relics.flavorText: A cup of Cappuccino, please.

relics.name: Oak Barrel
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 1 potion slot. Potions in combat rewards will always be Entropic Brew.
relics.flavorText: Life was like a cask full of mixed potions, you never know what potion you are gonna get.

relics.name: Potion Backpack
relics.description: Whenever you discard a potion , gain 30 Gold .
relics.flavorText: Don't just discard your unwanted potions. Why not sell them?

relics.name: Quill
relics.description: At the end of turn, you can select a Power in your hand to Retain, and reduce its cost by 1.
relics.flavorText: The words written by this quill are fluorescent. You wonder what ink it uses.

relics.name: Rabbit Lantern
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, gain 1 less Block but gain 1 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: A decoration to celebrate a traditional festival.

relics.name: Skeleton Mask
relics.description: At end of turn , instantly kill enemies whose HP is below 8 .
relics.flavorText: Take away weak souls.

relics.name: Wrench
relics.description: At the start of each combat , temporary upgrade cards in your hand.
relics.flavorText: "Equipment repairment and maintenance"

relics.name: Bloody Dagger
relics.description: Once per turn , when you receive unblocked attack damage , gain 6 Vigor .
relics.flavorText: There's a thirst for revenge in it.

relics.name: Bottled Tsunami
relics.description: Upon pickup , choose a card. It will return to draw pile after played.
relics.flavorText: You can hear the tsunami runs toward you......

relics.name: Bouncy Ball
relics.description: For every card you try to draw while your hand is full, gain 3 Block instead.
relics.flavorText: Fly upward, and bounce on the ceiling!

relics.name: Cocktail
relics.description: At start of combat , trigger the effect of a random potion .
relics.flavorText: Just mix them all together!

relics.name: Firecracker
relics.description: Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, deal half the damage to another random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Crackle Boom!

relics.name: Flame Boots
relics.description: After you play the 6th card in a turn, gain 4 temporary Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: Ignite the combat with your speed!

relics.name: Ghost Cloak
relics.description: Once per turn, if you receive 2 unblocked attack damage in a turn , gain 1 Intangible immediately.
relics.flavorText: Thin and ethereal.

relics.name: Gold Anvil
relics.description: Whenever you upgrade a card at campfire, upgrade another random card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Best anvil to forge the best weapons.

relics.name: Heavy Spear
relics.description: Whenever you deal attack damage that is not less than half of target's max HP , kill it instantly.
relics.flavorText: Overkill.

relics.name: Holy Statue
relics.description: At the start of the next 3 combats, upgrade ALL your cards. You can reset the number to 3 at campfire.
relics.flavorText: You feel blessed after praying before the statue.

relics.name: Huge Hammer
relics.description: Once every combat, if you deal at least 150 unblocked damage within one turn , stun ALL enemies this turn.
relics.flavorText: This is not an inflatable hammer!

relics.name: Joker
relics.description: The last card in your hand will be played twice.
relics.flavorText: Show your trump card at the last minute.

relics.name: Magic Hat
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn , Retain cards in your hand this turn.
relics.flavorText: How did you do that?

relics.name: Magic Wand
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn , draw 2 extra cards next turn.
relics.flavorText: How did you do that?

relics.name: Purifying Flame
relics.description: Whenever you Rest, remove a random Curse from your deck.
relics.flavorText: The holy and powerful flame will certainly purify your curses.

relics.name: Rune Of Horror
relics.description: At the end of your turn, enemies who don't intend to Attack lose 1 Strength .
relics.flavorText: While you are afraid of your enemies, your enemies are also afraid of you.

relics.name: Speedy Hand
relics.description: You can add ALL 3 cards in a card reward to your deck and upgrade them.
relics.flavorText: Grab them all!

relics.name: Stone Of Resonance
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, if there is any same card in hand, play the card again.
relics.flavorText: One of the only two identical stones in the world.

relics.name: Tower Shield
relics.description: Whenever enemies gain Block , gain equal Block next turn.
relics.flavorText: Build your defence before your enemy attacks.

relics.name: Vintage
relics.description: If a potion stays in your potion slot for at least 5 combats, double its effect.
relics.flavorText: The secret of best vintage is time.

relics.name: "Invincible"
relics.description: You lose at most 20/30 (Non-Elite/Elite or Boss) HP every turn.
relics.flavorText: An amulet in the shape of Corrupt Heart , the invincible ruler of the spire.

relics.name: Bottled Snowflake
relics.description: Upon pickup , choose a card. It is free to play once every combat.
relics.flavorText: The last snow before the blight turn them all red.

relics.name: Echo Conch
relics.description: At the end of turn , you can select a card to move from discard pile to draw pile .
relics.flavorText: If you listen closely, you can hear the ocean.

relics.name: Garlic
relics.description: At the first turn of each combat , negate ALL DEBUFFs.
relics.flavorText: It stinks!

relics.name: Golden Lance
relics.description: If all cards in your hand are Attack , your Attacks deal double damage.
relics.flavorText: The best defence is attack.

relics.name: Heart Chain
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP for reasons other than this relic, prevent this damage and lose equal HP later at the end of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: A contract with the Death.

relics.name: Hypnotic Watch
relics.description: Once every combat , if you don't play any card in your turn , stun ALL enemies this turn.
relics.flavorText: Time for a nap.

relics.name: Magic Ointment
relics.description: When obtained, heal 25 HP and set its counter to your current HP. At the end of combat, if your HP is lower than its counter, restore HP to counter and set counter to the HP before recovery.
relics.flavorText: It can relieve your pain, but it can't really cure your wound.

relics.name: Power Crystal
relics.description: Cost of ALL Power cards reduced by 1 .
relics.flavorText: "Power" Crystal is surely helpful with Powers.

relics.name: Soul Absorber
relics.description: Whenever a non-minion enemy die from a non-attack damage , gain 2 max HP.
relics.flavorText: Take its soul without an attack.

relics.name: Spike Shield
relics.description: Whenever you block attack damage from an enemy , deal equal damage to damage source.
relics.flavorText: Never attack a shield with spikes on it.

relics.name: Spring Gloves
relics.description: If you do not play any Attacks during your turn , gain 6 temorary Strength next turn.
relics.flavorText: The more the spring compresses, the heavier the punch is.

relics.name: Stun Grenade
relics.description: Enemies do no damage at the first turn every combat.
relics.flavorText: Surprise!

relics.name: Telescope
relics.description: Once per combat , right click to Scry 5 .
relics.flavorText: You can see the stars clearly through the fog around the spire.

relics.name: Time Machine
relics.description: Right click to record your current HP. Right click again to change your HP back later. Can be used only once.
relics.flavorText: Back to the golden age......

relics.name: Autobot Helper
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn, and automatically play the rightmost card in your hand (cost 1 less energy).
relics.flavorText: Feeling busy? Try this automatic helper!

relics.name: Curse Staff
relics.description: Add 2 Necronomicurse to deck. Whenever you draw a Necronomicurse , gain [E] and draw 1 extra card.
relics.flavorText: Once belonged to the most notorious wizard in the spire.

relics.name: Death Countdown
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of turn 8 , receive 99999 damage.
relics.flavorText: The bell of Death will toll soon......

relics.name: Donu and Deca
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of odd turns. Draw 1 extra card at even turns.
relics.flavorText: "The greatest work I've ever done." - The Architect

relics.name: Elixir Of Life
relics.description: Upon pickup , increase your max HP by 50% . Start each combat with 4 Regen.
relics.flavorText: Want to live forever? Also works for robots!

relics.name: Fang Necklace
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you take unblocked attack damage , gain 1 Poison .
relics.flavorText: Don't hurt your self while wearing this. It's poisoned.

relics.name: Glass Crown
relics.description: If you didn't take any unblocked attack damage in a combat , Upgrade a random card , gain 5 max HP and 30 Gold .
relics.flavorText: Protect the fragile Crown , and you will gain infinite honor and wealth.

relics.name: Hero Biography
relics.description: At the start of your turn , if there's any Power cards in draw pile , discard pile or hand , gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: What an exciting book! But the story is too short.

relics.name: Magic Eight
relics.description: The 8th card from the left in your hand always costs 0.
relics.flavorText: ASK AGAIN LATER

relics.name: Overclocked Chip
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Cards that cost 2 or more have Ethereal.
relics.flavorText: It has a large but unstable power.

relics.name: Solid Time
relics.description:
Whenever you play a Power in your deck, lose 6 Max HP and remove it from your deck.
Automatically trigger the effect of the card at the start of every combat.
relics.flavorText: A cube glittering with strange light.

relics.name: Unknown Potion
relics.description: At the start of turn, gain [E] , gain 2 poison ( 60% ) and gain 2 regen ( 30% ).
relics.flavorText: You have a stomachache after drinking this potion.

relics.name: AED
relics.description: If your HP is not more than 3 at the end of combat, heal all of your HP.
relics.flavorText: Be careful when you are trying to trigger this......

relics.name: Blue Pellets
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove enemies' Block and Artifact.
relics.flavorText: These are in fact small bombs disguised as pellets.

relics.name: Curse Torch
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse , draw 2 extra card.
relics.flavorText: No extinguishing, no discard, NO REFUNDS! HAHAHA!

relics.name: Gift Card
relics.description: Set the prices of the other two relics in shop to 0 .
relics.flavorText: Buy one , get two free!

relics.name: Golden Apple
relics.description:
Gain 4 Temporary HP at the start of combat.
When you gain Max HP, the amount gained is doubled.
relics.flavorText: The most delicious fruit in the world -- Try one!

relics.name: Medieval Helmet
relics.description: Right click to enable/disable: Your attacks deal 1/2 less damage, but you gain Block equals to unblocked damage.
relics.flavorText: The helmet limits your view, so only wear it when in danger.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Akdsmorerelics:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
